names.english: strengthen the kidneys and transform dampness decoction
names.commonEnglish: Strengthen the Kidneys and Transform Dampness Decoction

actions: Nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the marrow.
With Shu Di Huang and Che Qian Zi, for blurred vision and spots before the eyes due to Kidney and Liver Deficiency.
Tonifies and stabilizes the Kidneys, tonifies Yang and astringes Jing and urine
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
with Xian Mao, for chills, impotence with cold sperm, cold extremities and infertility.
Clears Hot Phlegm and dissipates nodules.
With Zhe Be Mu, cools and relieves toxicity to disperse and transform Phlegm and treat goiter, scrofula and swollen or inflamed lymph glands.
Promotes the movement of Blood and invigorates the channels.
Invigorates the Blood, dissolves Phlegm, resolves Stagnation, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
With Zhe Bei Mu, for scrofula due to Phlegm-Fire.
Resolves Phlegm, softens Phlegm nodules, promotes urination and reduces swelling.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm and stops coughing.
Promotes urination, clears Damp-Heat, clears Liver Heat, clears the Lungs, expels Phlegm and stops coughing.

symptoms: A long history of Excess Phlegm
Delayed menstrual cycle with sticky discharge or
Possible swelling and edema of the lower limbs
A feeling of stuffiness in the chest
manifestations.pulse: Slippery or Wiry and slippery or Slippery, soft and thready or Thready and retarded
